channel.title: Help with Models for custom weapons
channel.description:
No this isn't one of those "How do I add models to my client" type of things. Oh and mods, if this is the wrong section for this, please feel free to move it.
When I add some custom items (in this case godswords), you can't see all of them from certain angles. Let me explain what I mean: [IMG]http://i299.photobucket.com/albums/mm320/modscape/error.jpg[/img] Does anybody know how to fix this?

item.title: Help with Models for custom weapons
item.dc:creator: @gunz4life gunz4life
item.description:
@gunz4life wrote:

It may just be THAT client. Maybe try on another one? just to see.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with Models for custom weapons

item.title: Help with Models for custom weapons

It’s fine dude. Just wondering if there was a way to fix this.

item.title: Help with Models for custom weapons

item.description:
@gunz4life wrote:

Oh, well, it doesn’t happen me i get a worse error, a lot stuff i add becomes like… it looks like the item when u put on its really no its like some object lol, sorry i can’t help =/

item.title: Help with Models for custom weapons
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Whip Mod Whip
item.description:
@Mod_Whip wrote:

gunz4life:

I think thats how it was made, if your talking about how it looks

No not exactly. It’s the same sort of effect that happens when adding some capes and stuff. Idk people said something about animating it if that has anything to do with it.

Read full topic
